subject: Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: Syracuse topped Virginia, 12-11, in double overtime, with a Mike Leveille goal with 1 minute 43 seconds remaining capping a 6-1 Syracuse run to end the game.
snippet: Syracuse topped Virginia, 12-11, in double overtime, with a Mike Leveille goal with 1 minute 43 seconds remaining capping a 6-1 Syracuse run to end the game.
